Text:
Legend of the Seeker is being canceled!
Google "save our seeker" for information on how you can help save this amazing show.
No offence.But this is a crappy show.Considering the likes of pacific,chuck and house MD this is too much romantic and teenage show.

@ maqsmihil.
Then what the hell are  you doing downloading this?!

@ maqsmihil
Seriously!!! Why the hell did you even click on this torrent?!?!??! just to speak yer mind???? Please direct your comment to a brick wall!!!....but you are right "The pacific" is the shit! LUV IT!!!!
Fuck maqsmihil  , hes wanking to kahlan now as we know it anyway.
It is sad that this show is ending, but look forward to the new Series - A Song of Ice and Fire!!!

Shows such as Glee and Chuck are a lot better than Legend of the Seeker... Oh wait, they suck.

At least I still have my other shows such as Fringe, FlashForward, House MD, SGU, Supernatural, Lost and V.
I hope to the people who end this serie never see the light of the creator and to get burned in the green fires of the underworld.... Thanks!

Does nobody else her see the irony of a pirate downloader comp;laining that his show he illegally downloaded is being cancelled?  Until Neilson tracks torrents, nearly every show made today will be cancelled almost immediately.

The book is way better then this show.
Seriusly read the two first books and you will find out exactly how mord sith torture realy is.
